## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT2G29580](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT2G29580)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtC3H25, MAC5B</u>
- **Gene Name:** MOS4-associated complex subunit 5B
- **Description:**   CCCH-type zinc fingerfamily protein with RNA-binding domain-containing protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
